name: linkRecall
description: Build a memory of everything you read using local embeddings and semantic search

scripts.start:dev: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build -w linkrecall-backend && npm run build -w linkrecall-web
scripts.format: npm run format -w linkrecall-backend && npm run format -w linkrecall-web
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w linkrecall-backend && npm run lint -w linkrecall-web
